question: Chappaquiddick is an upcoming American drama film starring an Australian film and television actor known for playing Tommy Caffee on what television series?
context:
Chappaquiddick is a 2017 American drama film directed by John Curran and written by Taylor Allen and Andrew Logan. The film stars Jason Clarke, Kate Mara, Ed Helms, Bruce Dern, Jim Gaffigan and Taylor Nichols. It was screened in the Gala Presentations section at the 2017 Toronto International Film Festival. The film is scheduled to be released on December 8, 2017, by Entertainment Studios.

Jason Clarke (born 17 July 1969) is an Australian film and television actor. Clarke has appeared in many TV series, and is known for playing Tommy Caffee on the television series Brotherhood. He has also appeared in many films, often as an antagonist. Some of his film roles include Death Race (2008), Public Enemies (2009), Zero Dark Thirty (2013), White House Down (2013), Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014), Terminator Genisys (2015) and Everest (2015).
